  • Method Details

    • insertTiles

      public void insertTiles(List<Tile> t, int column) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Inserts all tiles int list t from leftmost to rightmost in the Shelf, inserting from bottom to top.
      Parameters:
      t - - list of tiles to be inserted, size [1 ... 3]
      column - - column of the shelf where tiles will be added è [0 ... 4]
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the chosen column can't hold all the players tiles or the selected column is out of bounds of the shelf

    • getGrid

      public Tile[][] getGrid()

    • getAdjScore

      public int getAdjScore()
      Returns:
      the points from the current adjacencies

    • scoreCalc

      public int scoreCalc(int adjCounter)
      Parameters:
      adjCounter - -counter of adjacent tiles used to transform the number of adjacent tiles to the respective score for the game

    • checkUp

      public boolean checkUp(int j, int k, Type tileType)
      These checkX functions check if the tileType of the Tile that we are looking at is equals to the one at its left/right or the one above/below
      Parameters:
      j - line
      k - column
      tileType - type of the current Tile
      Returns:
      true if the tileType of the current tile is equal to the checked one

    • checkDown

      public boolean checkDown(int j, int k, Type tileType)

      public boolean checkRight(int j, int k, Type tileType)

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Returns:
      true if shelf is full or false otherwise

    • canItFit

      public boolean canItFit(int amountOfTiles, int column) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      amountOfTiles - - the amount of tiles you're trying to insert
      column - - in which column to insert [0 ... 4]
      Returns:
      - true if the tiles can fit, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if column is out of bounds of shelf

    • getGridForDisplay

      public Tile[][] getGridForDisplay()
      This method returns a copy of the grid
      Returns:
      a Tile matrix that is the copy of the grid of the shelf
